personalInfo.cityPlaysFrm: Plays out of Las Sendas GC

tourBios.carHigh: Finished T-7 at the 2003 TELUS Edmonton Open, Made the cut at the Victoria Open the following week, it was the last event he played on PGA TOUR Canada, Won the 1996 Payless Open and the 1999 Niagara Classic, an unofficial Tour event, First PGA TOUR Canada event was the 1991 Payless/Pepsi Open (T-44), In 1996 won the SCORE Magazine Award as Canada's top touring professional, he also won the Gordon Brydson Trophy as the Most Improved Player that same year
tourBios.personal: Hoping to take a run at the Champions Tour when he turns 50 in September of 2012
tourBios.otherInfo: Also has played on the PGA, Australasian, Asian, South America, and Web.com tours.
tourBios.prYrSeason: Returned from a nine-year hiatus to play PGA TOUR Canada in 2012

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was 2nd in 1997 at the NIKE St. Louis Golf Classic.
